Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package docker-cli for versions less than 25.0.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package docker-cli for versions less than 25.0.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-cli is earlier than 25.0.7-1, affected by CVE-2023-45288
